metadata.title: CVE-2024-2605 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker could have leveraged the Windows Error Reporter to runarbitrary code on the system escaping the sandbox. *Note:* This issue onlyaffected Windows operating systems. Other operating systems are unaffected.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 124, Firefox ESR < 115.9, andThunderbird < 115.9.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
